#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        vector<int> price[10];
        for(int i=0;i<10;i++)
        {
            for(int j=0;j<15;j++)
            {
                int temp;
                scanf("%d",&temp);
                price[i].push_back(temp);
            }
        }
        sort(price[0].begin(),price[0].end());
        int min_diff=price[0][14]-price[0][0];
        int index=1;
        for(int i=1;i<10;i++)
        {
            sort(price[i].begin(),price[i].end());
            int diff=price[i][14]-price[i][0];
            if(min_diff>=diff)
            {
                index=i+1;
                min_diff=diff;
            }
        }
        printf("%d %d\n",index,min_diff);
    }
    return 0;
}
